def sort_dict(my_dict1, my_dict2):
    merged_dict = my_dict1.copy()
    merged_dict.update(my_dict2)
    sorted_dict = sorted(merged_dict.items(), key=lambda item: len(item[-1]), reverse=True)
    return sorted_dict
